sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const CommunicationHub = ({ onBack, onEmails, onTemplates, onBulkEmail, clients }) => { const communicationStats = { totalEmails: 45, unreadEmails: 12, sentThisWeek: 23, responseRate: '78%' }; const quickActions = [ { id: 'emails', title: 'Email Management', description: 'Manage client emails, inbox, and sent items', icon: 'fas fa-envelope', color: '#3b82f6', action: onEmails, stats: `${communicationStats.totalEmails} Total Emails` }, { id: 'templates', title: 'Email Templates', description: 'Create and manage email templates for quick communication', icon: 'fas fa-layer-group', color: '#10b981', action: onTemplates, stats: '12 Templates Available' }, { id: 'bulk-email', title: 'Bulk Email', description: 'Send emails to multiple clients at once', icon: 'fas fa-mail-bulk', color: '#f59e0b', action: onBulkEmail, stats: `${clients.length} Clients Available` }, { id: 'analytics', title: 'Communication Analytics', description: 'View communication metrics and performance', icon: 'fas fa-chart-bar', color: '#8b5cf6', action: () => console.log('Analytics'), stats: `${communicationStats.responseRate} Response Rate` } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'email', client: 'GreenTech Initiative', action: 'Email Sent', time: '2 hours ago', status: 'sent' }, { id: 2, type: 'template', client: 'All Clients', action: 'Template Created', time: '1 day ago', status: 'completed' }, { id: 3, type: 'bulk', client: '5 Clients', action: 'Bulk Email Scheduled', time: '2 days ago', status: 'scheduled' } ]; return (

Communication Hub

Centralized platform for all client communication management

{/* Stats Overview */}

{communicationStats.totalEmails}

Total Emails

+12%

{communicationStats.unreadEmails}

Unread Emails

-5%

{communicationStats.sentThisWeek}

Sent This Week

+8%

{communicationStats.responseRate}

Response Rate

+15%
{/* Quick Actions Grid */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map(action => (

{action.title}

{action.description}

{action.stats}
))}
{/* Recent Activity & Communication Tools */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map(activity => (

{activity.action} for {activity.client}

{activity.time}
{activity.status}
))}
{/* Communication Tools */}

Communication Tools

Quick Compose

Start a new email immediately

Schedule Emails

Plan emails for optimal timing

Analytics

View communication insights

Settings

Configure communication preferences

{/* Upcoming Communications */}

Upcoming Communications

15 NOV

Follow-up: Sarah Chen

Grant proposal discussion and next steps

Email Reminder 10:00 AM
16 NOV

Bulk Update: All Active Clients

Quarterly grant opportunities newsletter

12 Clients 9:00 AM
); }; export default CommunicationHub;
